job.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Position: Site Reliability EngineerLocation: Remote till Covid, Weehawken, NJType of job: ContractJOB Description location: the initially remote post that Weehawken US once situation normalize.   Primary skills for a new SRE: Linux administrationBash shell scriptingExperience with Azure or another cloud providerDocker and KubernetesExperience with Application performance monitoring tools.Experience with any languages for querying log data – search processing language (Splunk), Kusto (Azure), Kibana query language (Elasticsearch)SQLUnderstanding of SRE concepts.Git  Additional skills:PythonInfrastructure as code (Terraform, Puppet, Chef or Ansible)DevOps build automation and CI/CD (Gerrit, Maven, Jenkins, Nexus, Artifactory, Selenium) Thanks Ashwini4085569096ashwini@tsourceinc.net
